article: " Tell me what you are going to do  _  Sunday morning, Mike." Mr. Zhang asks, "I'm going to see  _  new film. It's an English film  _  the life of the students in America. Bill tells me it's  _  interesting." " After seeing the film, what are you going to do?" Mr. Zhang wants  to know  . " I'm going to read Chinese." Mike says. "Do you like it?" asks Mr. Zhang. "Chinese is not  _  for me, but I like it very much. I'm going  to work  hard at it. After lunch I'm going to do my homework. I think I  can  do it better than before." "Then,  _  about Sunday evening?" Mr. Zhang asks, "After supper I'm going to help Han Mei  _  her English. She wants my help." Mike says. "You are going to have a busy day, aren't you?" says Mr. Zhang.
